body_html:
@arnaghizadeh No, I didn’t look at the Swift implementation but I will, thanks for the tip!

For the Java part, I also believe that Kotlin is the way to go these days for a simplified version of the language, so I’ll make sure we take all advantages of it in the API we are building. Please let me know if you have any specific idea in mind about this.
body_text:
@arnaghizadeh No, I didn’t look at the Swift implementation but I will, thanks for the tip!
For the Java part, I also believe that Kotlin is the way to go these days for a simplified version of the language, so I’ll make sure we take all advantages of it in the API we are building. Please let me know if you have any specific idea in mind about this.
body:
@arnaghizadeh No, I didn’t look at the Swift implementation but I will, thanks for the tip!

For the Java part, I also believe that Kotlin is the way to go these days for a simplified version of the language, so I’ll make sure we take all advantages of it in the API we are building. Please let me know if you have any specific idea in mind about this.
